summary: Both REQ-12 and REQ-13 are well-implemented. Login.tsx provides a centered card with username/password fields, error display, and masked password input. useAuth.ts manages sessionStorage-based authentication with hardcoded credentials. App.tsx conditionally renders Login or the full app. Header.tsx exposes a logout button. All major acceptance criteria are satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Duplicate Toaster component rendered in App.tsx â€” one inside the authenticated branch and one outside it at the bottom of ThemeProvider.
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff shows two Toaster components in App.tsx. This was not requested and causes a redundant duplicate toast provider.
